sentences.sCn: 警察围在法院大楼四周。

sentences.sContent: ...Then the police take the suspect to the police station...
...The police must give the suspect the reasons why they arc arresting him and tell him his rights under the law...
...Citizens with much to protect get greater benefit from police than those with less to protect...
...I'll call the police if you dare insult me...
...On the basis of the police report...
...I just like to go over some of the things that you told police officer Parmer at the bank...
...you may not know that he also holds a master's degree in criminology and studied abroad for a year with the international police force which deals with crimes around the world...

...The idea behind the program is to get the police officers out of their cars and into our neighborhoods where they can talk directly to merchants and residents about the real dynamics of our city...
...Washington has a distinguished record as head of our police force for more than ten years...

synos.tran: 监督；管辖；维持治安；为…配备警察

phrases.pCn: 警察权，治安权；警察部队
n. 警察国家；极权国家

trans.tranOther: the people who work for an official organization whose job is to catch criminals and make sure that people obey the law
